settings.managePreferences: Manage your app preferences and cache settings
settings.fixesOutdated: Fixes issues with outdated app versions
settings.forcesFreshData: Forces fresh data from servers when needed
settings.clearCacheDescription: Clear Cache: When experiencing data inconsistencies or after app updates
settings.forceReloadDescription: Force Reload: When the app seems stuck or unresponsive
settings.checkUpdatesDescription: Check Updates: To manually check for new app versions

settings.customizeAudioPreferences: Customize your audio preferences for match scoring
